anya-e0802n1:15_0: Te ca kho akkharā api akārādayo ekacattā līsa suttantesu sopakārā.
anya-e0802n1:16_1: A ā i ī u ū e o,
anya-e0802n1:16_7: ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṁ,
anya-e0802n1:19_0: Tattha akkharesu akārādīsu odantā aṭṭha akkharā sarā nāma honti.
anya-e0802n1:20_0: Taṁ yathā? A ā i ī u ū e o, iti sarā nāma.
anya-e0802n1:23_0: Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu lahumattā tayo sarā rassā nāma honti.
anya-e0802n1:24_0: Taṁ yathā? A i u, iti rassā nāma.
anya-e0802n1:27_0: Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu rassehi aññe pañca sarā dīghā nāma honti.
anya-e0802n1:28_0: Taṁ yathā? Ā ī ū e o, iti dīghā nāma.
anya-e0802n1:31_0: Ṭhapetvā aṭṭha sare sesā akkharā kakārādayo niggahitantā byañjanā nāma honti.
anya-e0802n1:32_6: ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṁ,
anya-e0802n1:35_0: Tesaṁ kho byañjanānaṁ kakārādayo makārantā pañcapañcaso akkharavanto vaggā nāma honti.
anya-e0802n1:42_0: Yā ca pana paresu sakkataganthesu samaññā ghosāti vā aghosāti vā, tā payoge sati etthāpi yujjante.
anya-e0802n1:43_5: ya ra la va ha ḷa,
anya-e0802n1:43_7: Aghosā nāma-ka kha, ca cha, ṭa ṭha, ta tha, pa pha, sa,
anya-e0802n1:46_0: Tattha sandhiṁ kattukāmo pubbabyañjanaṁ adhoṭhitaṁ assaraṁ katvā sarañca upari katvā sarena viyojaye.
anya-e0802n1:49_0: Assaraṁ kho byañjanaṁ adhoṭhataṁ parakkharaṁ naye yutte. Tatrābhiratimiccheyya.
anya-e0802n1:50_0: Yuttetikasmā? Akkocchi maṁ avadhi maṁ, ajini maṁ ahāsi me. Ettha pana yuttaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0802n1:54_0: Sarā kho sare pare lopaṁ papponti.
anya-e0802n1:55_0: Yassindriyāni samathaṅgatāni. No hetaṁ bhante sametāyasmā saṅghena.
anya-e0802n1:57_0: Saramhā asarūpā paro saro lopaṁ pappoti vā.
anya-e0802n1:60_0: Saro kho paro pubbasare lutte kvaci asavaṇṇaṁ pappoti.
anya-e0802n1:62_0: Kvacīti kasmā? Yassindriyāni, tathūpamaṁ dhammavaraṁ adesayi.
anya-e0802n1:64_0: Saro kho paro pubbasare lutte kvaci dīghaṁ pappoti.
anya-e0802n1:65_0: Kvacīti kasmā? Pañcahupāli aṅgehi samannāgato. Natthaññaṁ kiñci.
anya-e0802n1:67_0: Pubbo ca saro parasaralope kate kvaci dīghaṁ pappoti.
anya-e0802n1:68_0: Kiṁsūdha vittaṁ purisassa seṭṭhaṁ, sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā, kvacīti kasmā? Itissa muhuttampi.
anya-e0802n1:70_0: Ekārassa antabhūtassa sare pare kvaci yakārādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n1:71_0: Adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo, tyāhaṁ evaṁ vadeyyaṁ, tyāssa pahīnā honti.
anya-e0802n1:74_0: Okārukārānaṁ antabhūtānaṁ sare pare kvaci vakārādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n1:75_0: Atha khvassa, svassa hoti, bahvābādho, vatthvettha vihitaṁ niccaṁ cakkhāpāthamāgacchati.
anya-e0802n1:76_0: Kvacītikasmā? Cattāro’me bhikkhave dhammā, kinnumāva samaṇiyo.
anya-e0802n1:78_0: Sabbo icceso tisaddo byañjano sare pare kvaci cakāraṁ pappoti.
anya-e0802n1:79_0: Iccetaṁ kusalaṁ, iccassa vacanīyaṁ, paccuttaritvā, paccāharati.
anya-e0802n1:82_0: Dhaiccetassa sare pare kvaci dakārādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n1:85_0: Vaggahaṇena dhakārassa hakārādeso hoti sāhu dassana mariyānaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:100_0: Kho kassa, yathā? Nikkhamati. Iccevamādī yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n1:102_0: Pubbo ivaṇṇo sare pare yakāraṁ pappoti navā. Paṭisunthāravutyassa, sabbā vityānubhūyate.
anya-e0802n1:103_0: Navāti kasmā? Pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato, muttacāgī anuddhato.
anya-e0802n1:105_0: Saramhā parassa evassa ekārassa ādissa rikāro hoti, pubbo ca saro rasso hoti navā.
anya-e0802n1:106_0: Yathariva vasudhātalañca sabbaṁ, tathariva guṇavā supūjaniyo.
anya-e0802n1:107_0: Navāti kasmā? Yathā eva, tathā eva.
anya-e0802n1:111_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare pakatirūpāni honti.
anya-e0802n1:112_0: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, pamādo maccuno padaṁ, tiṇṇo pāraṅgato ahu.
anya-e0802n1:114_0: Sarā kho sare pare kvaci pakatirūpāni honti.
anya-e0802n1:118_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci dīghaṁ papponti.
anya-e0802n1:119_0: Sammā dhammaṁ vipassato, evaṁ gāme munī care, khantī paramaṁ tapo titikkhā.
anya-e0802n1:120_0: Kvacīti kasmā? Idha modati pecca modati, patilīyati, paṭihaññati.
anya-e0802n1:122_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci rassaṁ papponti.
anya-e0802n1:123_0: Bhovādināma so hoti, yathābhāvi guṇena so.
anya-e0802n1:124_0: Kvacīti kasmā? Sammāsamādhi, sāvittī chandaso mukhaṁ, upanīyati jīvitamappamāyu.
anya-e0802n1:126_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci lopaṁ papponti. Tatra ca lope kate akārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0802n1:128_0: Kvacīti kasmā? So muni, eso dhammo padissati, na so kāsāvamarahati.
anya-e0802n1:130_0: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa dvebhāvo hoti ṭhāne.
anya-e0802n1:131_0: Idhappamādo, purisassa jantuno, pabbajjaṁ kittayissāmi, cātuddasi, pañcaddasi, abhikkantataro cando.
anya-e0802n1:132_0: Ṭhāneti kasmā? Idha modati pecca modati.
anya-e0802n1:134_0: Vagge kho pubbesaṁ byañjanānaṁ ghosāghosabhūtānaṁ saramhā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ tatiyapaṭhamakkharā dvebhāvaṁ gacchanti ṭhāne.
anya-e0802n1:136_0: Ṭhāneti kasmā? Idha cetaso daḷhaṁ gaṇhāti thāmasā.
anya-e0802n1:140_0: Niggahitaṁ kho byañjane pare aṁ iti hoti.
anya-e0802n1:143_0: Vaggabhūte byañjane pare niggahitaṁ kho vaggantaṁ vā pappoti.
anya-e0802n1:146_0: Vāti kasmā? Na taṁ kammaṁ kataṁ sādhu.
anya-e0802n1:148_0: Ekārahakāre pare niggahitaṁ kho ñakāraṁ pappoti vā.
anya-e0802n1:150_0: Vāti kasmā? Evametaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ hoti subhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:152_0: Niggahitaṁ kho yakāre pare saha yakārena ñakāraṁ pappoti vā.
anya-e0802n1:156_0: Niggahitassa kho sare pare makāradakārādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n1:158_0: Vāti kasmā? Akkocchi maṁ avadhi maṁ, ajini maṁ ahāsi me.
anya-e0802n1:159_0: 35, 34.Ya va ma da na ta ra lā cāgamā.
anya-e0802n1:160_0: Sare pare yakāro vakāro makāro dakāro nakāro takāro rakāro lakāro ime āgamā honti vā.
anya-e0802n1:162_0: Vāti kasmā? Evaṁ mahiddhiyā esā, akkocchi maṁ avadhi maṁ, ajini maṁ ahāsi me, ajeyyo anugāmiko.
anya-e0802n1:163_0: Caggahaṇena idheva makārassa pakāro hoti. Cirappavāsiṁ purisaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:164_0: Kakārassa ca dakāro hoti. Sadatthapasuto siyā.
anya-e0802n1:168_0: Atippago kho tāva sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya carituṁ. Parosahassaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:169_0: Kvacīki kasmā? Etha passathimaṁ lokaṁ, andhībhūto ayaṁ loko.
anya-e0802n1:171_0: Niggahitañcāgamo hoti sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci.
anya-e0802n1:174_0: Caggahaṇena visaddassa ca pakāro hoti. Pacessati, vicessati vā.
anya-e0802n1:176_0: Niggahitaṁ kho sare pare kvaci lopaṁ pappoti.
anya-e0802n1:178_0: Kvacīti kasmā? Ahameva nūna bālo etamatthaṁ viditvāna.
anya-e0802n1:180_0: Niggahitaṁ kho byañjane pare kvaci lopaṁ pappoti.
anya-e0802n1:182_0: Kvacīti kasmā? Etaṁ maṅgalamuttamaṁ, taṁ vo vadāmi bhaddante.
anya-e0802n1:184_0: Niggahitamhā paro saro lopaṁ pappoti vā.
anya-e0802n1:186_0: Vāti kasmā? Ahameva nūna bālo, etadahosi.
anya-e0802n1:188_0: Niggahitamhā parasmiṁ sare lutte yadi byañjano sasaññogo visaññogo hoti.
anya-e0802n1:191_0: Caggahaṇena tiṇṇaṁ byañjanānamantare ye sarūpā, tesampi lopo hoti. Agyāgāraṁ, paṭisanthāravutyassa.
anya-e0802n1:195_0: Puthaiccetassa ante sare pare kvaci gakārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0802n1:198_0: Pāiccetassa ante sare pare kvaci gakārāgamo hoti, anto ca saro rasso hoti.
anya-e0802n1:202_0: Abhiiccetassa sare pare abbhādeso hoti. Abbhudīritaṁ, abbhuggacchati.
anya-e0802n1:207_0: Te ca kho abhiadhiiccete ivaṇṇe pare abbho ajjhoitivuttarūpā naṁ honti vā.
anya-e0802n1:211_0: Atiiccetassa antabhūtassa tisaddassa ivaṇṇe pare “sabbo caṁ tī”ti vuttarūpaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0802n1:215_0: Patiiccetassa sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci paṭiādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n1:217_0: Kvacīti kasmā? Paccantimesu janapadesu, patilīyati, patirūpadesavāso ca.
anya-e0802n1:219_0: Puthaiccetassa anto saro byañjane pare ukāro hoti.
anya-e0802n1:221_0: Antaggahaṇena aputhassāpi sare pare antassa ukāro hoti, manuññaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:223_0: Avaiccetassa byañjane pare kvaci okāro hoti.
anya-e0802n1:225_0: Kvacīti kasmā? Avasussatu me sarīre maṁsalohitaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:227_0: Anupadiṭṭhānaṁ upasagganipātānaṁ sarasandhīhi byañjanasandhīhi vuttasandhīhi ca yathāyogaṁ yojetabbaṁ.
